snippet.title: PS2 Longplay [021] Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen - Full Game Walkthrough
snippet.description:
#Transformers #RevengeoftheFallen #PS2
This is my walkthrough of Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen for PS2 console. It includes all cutscenes and boss fights in game.
Played on Normal Difficulty.
*If you like my videos please consider commenting, leave a like or subscribe. It really helps the channel.*
Optimus Invades 3:40
Ironhide vs. Demolishor 6:44
Pursuit Over Shanghai 14:02
Sideways Goes To Ground 24:35
Starscream Strikes 30:00
From The Depths 38:15
The Devastator 57:25
Bumblebee Breaks Free 1:19:23
Megatron’s Glory 1:41:24
Starscream’s Path 1:57:21
Megatron’s Onslaught 2:06:19
Jetfire’s Gift 2:27:13
Ironhide’s Stand 2:42:04
Prime’s Return 2:50:07
Final Showdown 2:58:03
Ending 3:03:11

The fate of the earth and the survival of the human race hang in the balance in the Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen video game for the Wii and PS2. Based on Hasbro’s legendary Transformers property, the game takes players on an action-packed journey that follows a similar storyline to that of the highly anticipated blockbuster film. Playing as both the Autobots and Decepticons, players are propelled into an adrenaline-pumping battle for supremacy across the globe where every second and every choice makes the difference between mankind’s salvation and annihilation.
